Phone is required to place phone calls.
In order to place phone calls using your phone, %1$s needs permission to the phone.\n\nTo continue, please grant permission on the following message.

In order to show your local contacts, %1$s needs permission to get your contacts from your phone.\n\nTo continue, please grant permission on the following message.

In order to use your device for VoIP, %1$s needs permission to make and manage phone calls.\n\nTo continue, please grant permission on the following message.

In order to use your device for voice calls, %1$s needs permission to the microphone.\n\nTo continue, please grant permission on the following message.

Camera and Microphone are required to make video calls.
In order to use your device for video calls, %1$s needs permission to the camera and microphone.\n\nTo continue, please grant permission on the following message.
Camera and Microphone are required to make video calls and contacts is required to show your local contacts.
In order to use your device for video calls and to show your local contacts, %1$s needs permission to the camera and microphone.\n\nTo continue, please grant permission on the following message.
Without these permissions: %1s some of your features may be limited or unable to be used. If you experience issues please consider enabling these features.
Camera is required to make video calls and contacts is required to show your local contacts.
In order to use your device for video calls and to show your local contacts, %1$s needs permission to the camera and microphone.\n\nTo continue, please grant permission on the following message.
Microphone is required to make video calls and contacts is required to show your local contacts.
In order to use your device for voice calls and to show your local contacts, %1$s needs permission to the camera and microphone.\n\nTo continue, please grant permission on the following message.
External Storage is required for file logging.
External Storage is required to download data.
In order to store files to aid with logging, %1$s needs permission to save files to your phone.\n\nTo continue, please grant permission on the following message.
In order to store files into device, %1$s needs permission to save files to your phone.\n\nTo continue, please grant permission on the following message.
Camera is required to update your avatar photo.
In order to update your avatar, %1$s needs permission to the camera.\n\nTo continue, please grant permission on the following message.
In order to see your local contacts, touch the button below to give permission for %1$s to get your contacts from your phone.
Notifications are required to receive calls.
In order to use your device to receive calls, %1$s needs permission to send you notifications.\n\nTo continue, please grant permission on the following message.

Set a schedule for when you want to allow notifications. We will automatically set you on do not disturb outside of those hours.
Select or create a schedule for when you want to allow notifications.
These schedules are created by an administrator and available to all users within your location.
Select the holidays you\'d like to exclude from the schedule.
Are you sure you want to delete this schedule?
Enter date you\'d like to exclude from the schedule.
This is an all day event
Kill and restart app to apply changes.
You will be signed in, but are not yet ready to receive calls.
You will be ready to receive calls.
You will not be available to receive calls.
You will be wrapping up and not available to receive calls.
You will be signed out and will not receive calls.

Allows you to send calls directly to voice mail without ringing your phone. In addition, you can make your primary phone emit a short ring burst to inform them when the call is being sent to voice mail by using the Ring Reminder. This is important when forgetting the service is turned on and you are at your phone waiting to receive calls.

When do not disturb is enabled, incoming calls will be immediately forwarded to your busy voicemail greeting. To route calls to a busy signal instead, you must disallow voicemail for "busy calls" in your voicemail settings.
Automatically forward all your calls to a different phone number. When the system detects that you are receiving an incoming call, it sends that call to another phone that you have pre-selected.
Forward all of your calls to a different phone number.
Automatically forward all of your incoming calls to a different phone number, when your phone is busy or in Do Not Disturb.
Forward all of your incoming calls to a different phone number when you\'re busy. You can be considered busy when you are on do not disturb, or if you get a second call with call waiting disabled.
Automatically forward all your incoming calls to a different phone number if not answered within a specified number of rings.

Automatically forward an incoming call to another number when your phone is not accessible by Nextiva (deregistered). If your telephone gets physically disconnected, or the telephone system does not have your information entered correctly, the call won\'t be lost; it will get forwarded to a different number that you specify.
If you lose connectivity to Nextiva (for example, due to a power or internet outage for this user), you can have all calls automatically forward to an alternate phone number.

Think of Remote Office as two-way call forwarding; not only can you receive calls as if you were in the office, but you can make calls as well. All the calls you make will display your office caller ID to the people who receive your calls.

Remote Office allows you to substitute a different phone number, such as a mobile number, home or hotel phone number, as you office phone number. To make calls from your Remote Office location, you must use some sort of call control tool such as a dialer or call manager.
Block your display name from being shown to the person calling you.

Nextiva Anywhere is a means to connect your mobile phone and your desk phone. For example, you can call colleagues from your mobile phone using your four-digit extension, move calls seamlessly from a desk phone to a mobile phone when an important call needs to travel with you, and move a call from a mobile phone to a conference phone so others can listen in.

Nextiva Anywhere can do things standard call forwarding cannot. For instance, you can make calls showing your business line, take calls from call groups or call queues, record calls, and track call information all from your external phone (i.e. your cell phone).

List up to 10 phone numbers or SIP URI addresses you would like to ring in addition to your primary phone when you receive a call. This feature is helpful when you are not at your phone but would like your mobile phone to ring when you get a call.
Ring multiple phones or extensions simultaneously when someone calls your number.
Don\'t Ring While on a Call
Only one phone number can be imported. Select which phone number you would like to be imported with this contact.
